subject: Re: Flock/Eugene Contract
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Caroline Fraher

On Wed, Mar 19, 2025 at 5:58?PM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:


	Thank you Tim! Sending over to my legal for signatures now. 
	
	
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/flock-safety-secures-major-funding?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp

	On Wed, Mar 19, 2025 at 5:08?PM COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Good afternoon Caroline,

		 

		Please see the attached contract 2025-03244 between the City of Eugene and Flock Safety for ALPR Software Services. The Flock Work Order has been integrated as Exhibit B, and the Flock MSA has been included as Exhibit D (including Flocks information on Insurance). Please note, we corrected a few Exhibit references which referenced the wrong Exhibit letter due to combining City and Flock documents that looked to have generally followed a slightly different order.

		 

		Please forward this contract for review, and if everything is in order, sign and return a copy to the City (EPD). We will get the contract routed for countersignature immediately following that through our internal process with the intent to have the contract signed before the end of the month. Signature pages are listed on pages 9 & 16 of the attached contract.

		 

		If there are any questions, please let me know as soon as possible as we are all working toward the goal of having the contract executed by the end of the month. We appreciate your support and collaboration in pulling this together.

		https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401+%0D%0A+Office:+(541?entry=gmail&source=g 

		 

		https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401+%0D%0A+Office:+(541?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Best regards,

		 

		Tim Costin

		Sr. Financial Analyst

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401+%0D%0A+Office:+(541?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Eugene, Oregon 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401+%0D%0A+Office:+(541?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Office: (541 https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401+%0D%0A+Office:+(541?entry=gmail&source=g ) 682-8364

		Cell: (541) 844-9015



		 

		From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 2:03 PM
		To: COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: updated order form with new billing schedule

		 

		[EXTERNAL ?]

		Thank you Tim!

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/flock-safety-secures-major-funding?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/LqYnr2GL2QLy.png> 

		 

		 

		On Wed, Mar 19, 2025 at 2:01?PM COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			Received, this reflects what we discussed, thank you Caroline! We will get the contract compiled and back to you all for signature.

			 

			Tim

			 

			From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 1:59 PM
			To: COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
			Subject: Re: updated order form with new billing schedule

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			disregard above attachment. this is the correct one.

			 

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/flock-safety-secures-major-funding?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp

Caroline Fraher
